author: christopheralanwest
body:
#### PR description:

This is a backport of PR #28524. The backport is desired so as to have the complete set of conditions for the UL available by default for 11_0_X release validation.

#### PR validation:

See PR #28524 for a description of the validation. In addition, a technical test was performed: `runTheMatrix.py -l limited,7.2,7.4,7.21,7.22 --ibeos`

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

This is a backport of PR #28524.
title: Global tags for Run 2 UL reprocessing [11_0_X]
